CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS("HI",State),"Hawaiian", IF(CONTAINS("AK",State),"Alaskan", IF(CONTAINS("CA:NV:WA:BC",State),"Pacific", IF(CONTAINS("CO:MT:NM:UT:WY:AB",State),"Mountain", IF(CONTAINS("AZ",State),"Arizona", IF(CONTAINS("AL:AR:IL:IA:KS:LA:MN:MS:MO:OK:WI:MB",State),"Central", IF(CONTAINS("SK",State),"Saskatchewan", IF(CONTAINS("CT:DE:DC:GA:ME:MD:MA:NH:NJ:NY:NC:OH:PA:RI:SC:VT:VA:WV:ON:QC",State),"Eastern", IF(CONTAINS("NS",State),"Atlantic", IF(CONTAINS("NL",State),"Newfoundland", IF(CONTAINS("ID:OR",State),"Verify Pacific or Mountain", IF(CONTAINS("ND:NE:SD:TX",State),"Verify Mountain or Central", IF(CONTAINS("FL:IN:KY:MI:TN",State),"Verify Central or Eastern","Undefined")))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Suggested Time Zone
